insights.description: Golden sunrise over a glassy alpine lake framed by mountain silhouettes.

aiReview.summary: Reads as a peaceful travel hero shot with excellent tonal control in the sky.
strengths: Smooth highlight rolloff preserves detail in the clouds
Foreground-to-background sharpness keeps the reflection crisp
critique: Composition leans slightly heavy to the left shoreline
Minor banding visible in the deepest blues
actions: Add a subtle vignette to center the eye on the sun
Lift shadow noise in the water using a gentle luminance curve

insights.description: Street portrait with shallow depth of field and neon reflections.

aiReview.summary: Strong cinematic vibe that sells the downtown atmosphere.
strengths: Catchlights and rim lighting separate the subject from the background
Color contrast between cyan and magenta feels intentional
critique: Background bokeh is bright enough to compete with the face
actions: Use a radial mask to add 0.2 EV to the eyes and lips
Lower highlight saturation in the far right neon to calm distractions

insights.description: Flatlay of coffee service with pastries on a rustic tabletop.

aiReview.summary: Product story is clear but lacks a defined hero element.
strengths: Consistent top lighting minimizes harsh shadows
Color palette matches a cozy brand tone
critique: Scene feels crowded on the left edge
Highlights on the spoons clip slightly
actions: Re-frame with a subtle clockwise rotation to balance space
Brush down specular highlights and add clarity to the croissant

insights.description: Long exposure of a suspension bridge with light trails at night.

aiReview.summary: Dynamic lead lines with good control over mixed color temperatures.
strengths: Trailing headlights add energy without blowing highlights
Cable geometry guides the viewer toward the horizon
critique: Verticals lean inward on the right tower
Shadow noise visible along the waterline
actions: Apply lens correction and a minor perspective warp
Denoise the midtones and add subtle contrast to the sky

insights.description: Minimalist still life of citrus, ceramics, and greenery on pastel surfaces.

aiReview.summary: Polished studio look with great separation between foreground props.
strengths: Soft key light keeps texture without harsh speculars
Color blocking feels intentional and on-brand
critique: Minor cyan cast on the white ceramic
Top-left corner is empty compared to the rest of the frame
actions: Neutralize the ceramic whites with a selective WB adjustment
Add a small prop or gradient to balance the top-left negative space
